text:
Hello,
We're facing an issue with our marketing emails in HubSpot. When sending emails to customers, the entire content displays correctly in Outlook, but it gets cropped in Gmail. I learned that Gmail crops emails when the content exceeds 102 KB.
Has anyone else encountered this issue? Any suggestions on how to resolve it? Should we modify the HTML code or reduce the size of the email/images?
How are you building the email? The drag and drop editor?
Image filesize is not a factor. You need to reduce the weight of your code. How you go about this will be different based on whether it's a DnD or custom template.
It appears our custom template has excessive styling. looks like we need to streamline it by removing any unnecessary styles.
